mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (telegram_id, username, first_name, last_name, language_code, is_active) VALUES (#{telegramId}, #{username}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{languageCode}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, language_code = #{languageCode}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{id}
